mapper.insert: insert into board_star ( board_id, star_type, star_short_review, star_rating, sort_no ) values ( #{boardId}, #{starType}, #{starShortReview}, #{starRating}, #{sortNo} )
mapper.select: select board_id, star_type, star_short_review, star_rating from board_star where board_id = #{boardId} order By sort_no
